title: Five-Star Spain Wine Estate Stay near Salamanca with Daily Breakfast & Wine Tasting
description:
A true paradise for wine and food lovers, Hacienda Zorita Wine Hotel & Organic Farm is a peaceful oasis set amid gorgeous vineyards on the banks of Spain’s River Tormes. Part of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, Hacienda Zorita Wine Hotel & Organic Farm is a countryside haven where rich history and modern facilities meet.

Housed in a former Dominican monastery dating back to the 14th century, the hotel boasts 40 beautifully appointed rooms complete with original stone walls, magnificent oak beams, and fine works of art. World-class service and contemporary facilities await, including an elegant wine bar, a wine cellar, a day spa specialising in treatments using wine and olive oil, and a glorious outdoor pool surrounded by serene grounds. The gourmet farm-to-table restaurant, Zorita's Kitchen, sources produce from the estate's organic farm, just minutes from the hotel. A stay here would not be complete without a visit to the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Salamanca (a 15-minute drive away) for a mesmerising mix of art, history, and vibrant modern life. Stroll through the city’s historic centre and take in the Romanesque, Gothic and Renaissance monuments, wander the halls of one of the oldest universities in Europe and embrace the Spanish lifestyle with vino and tapas in one of the city's bustling bars.
offer_address: Carretera Ledesma Km 10, Valverdon, Salamanca 37115, Spain

title: Five-Star Spanish Countryside Vineyard Escape
description:

World-class service and contemporary facilities await, including an elegant wine bar, day spa specialising in wine therapy, stunning wine cellar and a glorious outdoor pool surrounded by serene grounds. The gourmet farm-to-table restaurant, Zorita's Kitchen, sources produce from the estate's 250-hectare organic farm, located just minutes from the hotel.
